titleStmt.title: Zions thankfull ecchoes from the clifts of Ireland. Or the little Church of Christ in Ireland, warbling out her humble and gratefull addresses to her elder sister in England: and in particular, to the Parliament, to his Excellency, and to his army, or that part assigned to her assistance, now in her low, yet hopefull condition.
titleStmt.author: Calver, Edward, fl. 1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Harper at the Bible and Harp in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: "The messengers humble presentation" signed: Edvvard Calver.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
